biocontainers.name: tophat
biocontainers.summary: Program that aligns rna-seq reads to a genome in order to identify exon-exon splice junctions. it is built on the ultrafast short read mapping program bowtie. a stable samtools version is now packaged with the program.

biotools.summary: Program that aligns RNA-Seq reads to a genome in order to identify exon-exon splice junctions. It is built on the ultrafast short read mapping program Bowtie. A stable SAMtools version is now packaged with the program.

bioschemas.name: TopHat
bioschemas.summary: Program that aligns RNA-Seq reads to a genome in order to identify exon-exon splice junctions. It is built on the ultrafast short read mapping program Bowtie. A stable SAMtools version is now packaged with the program.
